column4: anyone seen an error in VMware with ubuntu where all of the sudden the virtural machines run at very strange speeds and when you get into windows its running at like super speed and the time is runnign crazy fast ???
I got a error message from vmware saying that this machine is running at 61mhz .. but it going at insane speed like under 10seconds to boot a xp pro vm machine..
sorry bro, I have no experience with VMware :/
